title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset, an issue occurs where the group dialog does not appear as expected.
OB: When a table report item is added without a dataset set, the group dialog does not appear when trying to create a new table group.
EB: When a table report item is added without a dataset set, the group dialog should appear when trying to create a new table group.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. Observe that the group dialog does not appear as expected.

Expected result: 
The group dialog should appear when trying to create a new table group, even if the dataset is not set.
